Moo::Vertices::ScopedVertexArray

Moo::Vertices::ScopedVertexArray< VertexType > Class Template Reference

This class holds an array of vertices on the heap, destroying them when object goes out of scope. More...

#include <vertices.hpp>

Detailed Description

template<typename VertexType>
class Moo::Vertices::ScopedVertexArray< VertexType >

This class holds an array of vertices on the heap, destroying them when object goes out of scope.
